posts.post_content:
I have the following T205 Piedmont commons for sale.  Prices include shipping.  Paypal or check accepted.  Please reserve at [url]old-baseball@sbcglobal.net[/url].  More backs coming in the next several days.  Thanks for looking.

Kevin

Lookit all them pretty baseball cards. 
Thought I would give you a little bump, Kevin, and say thanks for the Tannehill T205 that arrived safe, sound and quickly yesterday. The "Antique Sports Collectible" notation on the customs dec worked like a charm. Didn't get dinged for import taxes which is always nice.
